Prompts.text: Shawn's idea - journal prompts. Save them to JSON and then add the ability to make custom prompts in the Settings menu.

Settings.text: Put settings in a canvas with a scrollbar so that it can be scrollable

Colors.text: If default color scheme not found, display a message asking the user to pick a color scheme from the dropdown menu.

Fonts.text: Allow custom fonts, in addition to the default Tkinter ones
